Episodes.Title: My Name Is Inmate #28301-016: Part 1
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl begins to serve his prison sentence. While he's there, he runs into Sonny, who teaches Earl the best way to go unnoticed. Meanwhile, Joy and Darnell are forced to take care of Randy while Earl is gone.

Episodes.Title: The Gangs of Camden County
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: The warden offers Earl a month off his sentence if he can negotiate a truce between the African-American gang and the Latino gang. But during the negotiations, he learns that the two leaders are actually in love.

Episodes.Title: The Frank Factor
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl runs into his old roommate Frank, who is in prison for a bank robbery that Earl and Randy were supposed to help with. However, Earl missed the robbery at the last minute because he married Joy the night before.

Episodes.Title: Creative Writing
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: While Earl struggles to write a paper for his prison creative writing class, Randy, Joy, Darnell, and Catalina have no trouble coming up with creative story ideas of their own.

Episodes.Title: Frank's Girl
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl tries to get Frank back together with his girlfriend after she breaks up with him, but he has second thoughts when he discovers that she'd be better off without him. Meanwhile Catalina gets a compromising cell phone photo of ...

Episodes.Title: Our Other Cops Is On!: Part 1
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: While enjoying TV time in prison, Earl and Randy are excited when they see that the show "Cops" is filming in Camden County.

Episodes.Title: Our Other Cops Is On!: Part 2
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Timothy Stack, Vali Chandrasekaran
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Randy and the prisoners watch a second episode of "Cops," which features the Camden County Police responding to a series of disturbances on the first 4th of July after 9/11.

Episodes.Title: Randy in Charge: Of Our Days and Our Nights
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl is supposed to set up a "scared straight" lecture for school kids, until he gets in a fight with Randy over who's taking care of whom. Meanwhile, Joy tries to induce labor.

Episodes.Title: Midnight Bun
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl and Randy are teamed up against their will to catch Frank, who escaped from a prison van under Randy's watch. Joy and her sister fight over how Joy's baby will be born.

Episodes.Title: Burn Victim
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: The warden promises to take the last six months off of Earl's sentence if he helps him out of one final jam. It ultimately will require him to spend the remainder of his lottery winnings on putting on a prom in the prison.

Episodes.Title: Early Release
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Jessica Goldstein, Chrissy Pietrosh
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: The warden reneges on his promise to Earl to grant an early release, so Earl launches a plan to escape from prison.

Episodes.Title: Bad Earl
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl is out of prison, but he and Randy are broke and homeless. So when he sees Ralph living the good life doing bad things, he declares that there is no karma and throws away the list.

Episodes.Title: I Won't Die with a Little Help from My Friends: Part 1
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl is in a coma after being hit by a car. Randy steals an ambulance to get him to the hospital, but getting there proves to be difficult and complicated.

Episodes.Title: I Won't Die with a Little Help from My Friends: Part 2
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Nothing can get Earl out of his coma, so Randy turns to a young faith healer from their past. However, the boy says that he no longer heals people because he discovered how Earl lived his life after he "healed" him the first time.

Episodes.Title: Stole a Motorcycle
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Kat Likkel, John Hoberg
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Randy discovers that crossing items off Earl's list improves his condition, but the first item he chooses, returning a stolen motorcycle, brings back a frightening memory from Randy and Earl's past that Randy had forgotten.

Episodes.Title: No Heads and a Duffle Bag
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: The next item that Randy tries to cross off of Earl's list involves ruining their parents' vacation--by leaving a duffel bag full of marijuana they found in the bed of their truck at their parents' house, only to have them find it.

Episodes.Title: Killerball
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl is still in a coma but released from the hospital, and Randy finds a way to get him to cross an item off the list by helping out a pair of paraplegic siblings.

Episodes.Title: Love Octagon
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Now that Earl is out of his coma, he sets out to find his true love, Billie. However, finding her is difficult, and he discovers that she has several other suitors trying to get her.

Episodes.Title: Girl Earl
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Billie starts her own list, and she and Earl help out a grocery store bagger whom they share on their lists. However, Earl soon discovers that Billie doesn't completely understand the concept of karma and The List.

Episodes.Title: Camdenites: Part 1
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Michael Pennie, Hilary Winston
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl discovers that helping the women he wronged on his list causes karma to improve his marriage to Billie.

Episodes.Title: Camdenites: Part 2
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Michael Pennie, Hilary Winston
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: When Earl finds out that making up for all the bad things he did to women changes Billie's behavior to the good, he picks the worst thing he ever did to women on his list. Billie wants him to choose between her and his list. When ...
